description:
WELCOME to one of the most unique website/blog creation courses available today!

If you are like me when I first started and struggled with building a website following difficult how to guides and videos, here you can watch OVER MY SHOULDER as I get a website up live and running in under 1 hour.

  • Do you want to quickly build websites so you can start earning money faster?
  • Do you hate 'how to' videos which show you HOW but when you do it you are left asking hundreds of questions?
  • You will see not only the technical aspects but I show you how I came up with the perfect website idea for me, watch as I design 2 logos using a free and paid software and how I made it stunning through easy theme installations, and a whole LOT MORE.
  • This course is structured in easy to follow steps so you can follow a long as I do it right in front of you.
  • This course will take you under 1 hour and by the end of it you'll be building websites and blogs like a pro.
title: Live Blog Creation: Watch Me Build A Website In Under 1 Hour
